title: Remove caffeine.xyz/caffeine.ai references from UI and docs

requirements.summary: Remove caffeine attribution/link from the public footer and ensure no other user-facing caffeine domain references remain.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer contains any link or text referencing caffeine.ai, caffeine.xyz, or caffine.xyz.
The footer shows an English copyright line (e.g., "© <current year> Subrin Kitab Pasal. All rights reserved.").
No other user-facing UI text contains caffeine.ai/caffeine.xyz/caffine.xyz.

file_operations.description: Replace the footer attribution block that links to caffeine.ai (including UTM parameters) with a simple English copyright line using the current year (e.g., "© {new Date().getFullYear()} Subrin Kitab Pasal. All rights reserved."). Also audit this file for any other occurrences of caffeine.ai/caffeine.xyz/caffine.xyz in user-facing text and remove/replace them.

requirements.summary: Remove/replace caffeine.xyz/caffine.xyz references in repository documentation and configuration examples with a neutral placeholder domain.
acceptanceCriteria: Repository docs/config examples contain no occurrences of "caffeine.xyz" or "caffine.xyz".
If domain examples are needed in docs, they use a neutral placeholder (e.g., example.com) and remain in English.

file_operations.description: Audit this deployment/custom-domain guide for any mentions of "caffeine.xyz" or "caffine.xyz" (including in example URLs/domains) and remove or replace them with a neutral placeholder domain such as "example.com", without changing the underlying custom-domain guidance beyond that.

Audit this analytics documentation for any mentions of "caffeine.xyz" or "caffine.xyz" (including in any sample URLs or configuration examples) and remove or replace them with a neutral placeholder domain such as "example.com", keeping all examples and text in English.
